body: @Kirby Hakurei Cosmico what the actual fuck are you talking about

I find a good trick to get into a lucid dream is to go back to bed on the weekend after waking up and enter the dream while your falling back to sleep, literally just spent about 2 hours doing this today lol.
Try sticking like half or a quarter of a nicotine patch on yourself before going to bed guys you'll have super vivid crazy dreams

i can pretty much lucid dream at will but everytime i do it i wake up tired and way too late
the trick is to just force a dream while youre still in the half sleep phase
The person below, pls tell me your secrets, I am wise but not enough, still dumb as a fucking meerkat hmmm

I remember when I met some 2hou girls in a lucid dream and I did a little bit of trolling with them conquering the whole world and then I was proclaimed the ruler of the world and made the world a better place. No more feminazis, no more wars, no more cringe, no more Twitter and Tiktok. Everything perfectly balanced as all things should be, all touhou fans joined me, even Zun himself was on my side in my plan to take over the world, I became the Thanos of the universe eradicating all cringe. All resistance was useless since with my powers I could do everything I wanted. Although I know it sounds weird but there I made Cirno the president of the United States and made a massive production of Fumos, but she's smart and I think she can do a good job. But do you know what the best part is? Thanks to the fact that I know how to have lucid dreams I can return to any dream I want, so every time I sleep I can access that cosmic world conquered by me and by the powerful Touhouverse.
Speaking of lucid dreams, once I was able to lucid dream, but my stupid ass thought "try waking up" and I fukcing woke up. I could have done anything, but I chose to fucking wake up
I'm more interested about the author situation than the manga itself. What kind of a summoning ritual was he doing there?
I bet if biggie read this he’d be like “it was all a dream”
